content: अहित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not placed, put, or fixed. {@--2@} Unfit, improper; <ls>Ms. 3. 20.</ls> {@--3@} Hurtful, detrimental, harmful, injurious, prejudicial. {@--4@} Disadvantageous, evil. {@--5@} Inimical, hostile. --तः An enemy; अहिताननिलोद्धूतैस्तर्जयन्निव केतुभिः <ls>R. 4. 28</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 17</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 68</ls>; तदहितयुवतेरभीक्ष्णमक्ष्णोः <ls>Śi. 7. 57</ls> a rival; <ls>Bg. 2. 36</ls>; <ls>K. 5</ls>, <ls n="K.">77.</ls> --तं {@--1@} Damage. {@--2@} Food.
